title: Did a California DA Say Looting Is ‘Okay’ If Suspects ‘Need’ What They Steal?
subtitle: Conservative websites and commentators misrepresented internal prosecutorial guidelines leaked in the summer of 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In internal guidelines, Contra Costa, California, District Attorney Diana Becton indicated that looting was acceptable and would not be prosecuted if a suspect "needed" what was stolen.
